original: Cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
analyzed: citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim kusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta sasaṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi
citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattim akusalam dhammam paṭicca no citta sa saṭṭha samuṭṭhāna anuparivattī

original: naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva.)
analyzed: na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā tīṇi pe avigate tīṇi abyākata mūlam tīṇi yeva
